sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-modal id="edit-product-modal" v-model="isModalVisible" title="Edit Product" @ok="handleSubmit">
    <b-form @submit.stop.prevent="handleSubmit">
      <b-form-group label="Title" label-for="product-title">
        <b-form-input
            id="product-title"
            v-model="productData.title"
            required
        ></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Description" label-for="product-description">
        <b-form-input
            id="product-description"
            v-model="productData.description"
            required
        ></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Due Date" label-for="product-due-date">
        <b-form-input
            id="product-due-date"
            v-model="productData.due_date"
            type="date"
            required
        ></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Status" label-for="product-status">
        <b-form-select
            id="product-status"
            v-model="productData.status"
            :options="statusOptions"
            required
        ></b-form-select>
      </b-form-group>
    </b-form>
  </b-modal>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    product: Object
  },
  data() {
    return {
      productData: {
        id: '',
        title: '',
        description: '',
        due_date: '',
        status: ''
      },
      statusOptions: [
        { value: 'active', text: 'Active' },
        { value: 'expired', text: 'Expired' }
      ],
      isModalVisible: false
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.initializeProductData();
  },
  watch: {
    product: {
      handler(newVal) {
        this.initializeProductData();
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    initializeProductData() {
      this.productData = { ...this.product };
    },
    showModal() {
      this.isModalVisible = true;
    },
    hideModal() {
      this.isModalVisible = false;
    },
    handleSubmit() {
      this.$emit('update-product', this.productData);
      this.hideModal();
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
